message: Unable to serialize claims object to json: Unable to serialize object: Java 8 optional type `java.util.Optional` not supported by default: add Module "com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype:jackson-datatype-jdk8" to enable handling (or disable `MapperFeature.REQUIRE_HANDLERS_FOR_JAVA8_OPTIONALS`) (through reference chain: io.jsonwebtoken.impl.DefaultClaims["Id"])
